comments:
When we run deploy right after importing a large ear files
we sometime get a NullPointerException from the j2ee deployer.

This is found in the .log

I see this error only once after import and subsequent deploy actions
always pass.  
--------------------------------------
ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.common.frameworks 4 4 2006-04-25 13:37:08.578
!MESSAGE Exception occurred running job.
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.deploy.J2EEDeployOperation.deploy(J2EEDeployOperation.java:128)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.deploy.J2EEDeployOperation.execute(J2EEDeployOperation.java:102)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.actions.J2EEDeployAction$1.run(J2EEDeployAction.java:62)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)

Actually, This happens when creating a new ejb project (with ear)
Add a cmp bean.  After that choose deploy action we get this error immediately
the first time. subsequent deploy actions do not give this error.
This is actually being caused by a resource unload from a propietary piece of mapping code.  They will fix on their end.
